VERIFIERS_PAGE.modalText: Are you sure you want to revoke {{credName}}?
VERIFIERS_PAGE.errRevoke: Error revoking credential. Contact your administrator.
VERIFIERS_PAGE.tableHelp: Review existing Verifier Credentials or create new ones.  As needed, complete additional actions, for example, view credential configurations or revoke credentials.
VERIFIERS_PAGE.noConfigBody: Before adding a credential, you need to set up at least one configuration in your configuration catalog
VERIFIERS_PAGE.invalidCredentialBody: The configuration associated with this credential no longer exists. Please revoke this credential because it is no longer valid
